page.title: 07SERVICES IN HURWORTH PLACE.
page.content: Croft Post Office, as well as a number of other shops, are situated in Hurworth Place, and are used by villagers from Croft, Dalton and Hurworth Place. The shops offer the usual general store produce, but there is also a wine store, a second-hand goods shop and a hairdresser. A mobile bread and confectionary van visits on Thursdays and Saturdays, and there are daily milk deliveries by three dairies. Durham County Library parks its van in the car park of one of the hotels once a fortnight on Wednesdays from 1.50 p.m. to 3.15 p.m. while a mobile video van is available on Friday evenings.
